publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3075 Marilyn Livingstone: Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn-That the Parliament expresses its deep regret and sadness at the death of Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn; conveys its sincere condolences to Barbara Castle's family and friends in their sad bereavement; celebrates the huge contribution she has made to British political life, women in politics and the Labour Party throughout her long and distinguished life, and notes her considerable achievements as an MP and in government promoting gender equality, equal pay, road safety, fairness for pensioners and international development. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson*

S1M-3075 Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn (lodged on 7 May 2002) Alex Neil*, Sarah Boyack*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Rhoda Grant*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Trish Godman*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Michael McMahon*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Helen Eadie*, Jackie Baillie*, Susan Deacon*, Kate Maclean*, Janis Hughes*
S1M-3075 Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn (lodged on 7 May 2002) Dennis Canavan*, Pauline McNeill*, Elaine Thomson*, Elaine Smith*, Angus MacKay*, Karen Gillon*, Des McNulty*, Karen Whitefield*

S1M-3075 Marilyn Livingstone: Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn-That the Parliament expresses its deep regret and sadness at the death of Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn; conveys its sincere condolences to Barbara Castle's family and friends in their sad bereavement; celebrates the huge contribution she has made to British political life, women in politics and the Labour Party throughout her long and distinguished life, and notes her considerable achievements as an MP and in government promoting gender equality, equal pay, road safety, fairness for pensioners and international development. Supported by: Margaret Jamieson, Alex Neil, Sarah Boyack, Tricia Marwick, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Brian Fitzpatrick, Rhoda Grant, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Trish Godman, Scott Barrie, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Cathie Craigie, Mr Michael McMahon, Mr Keith Raffan, Mr John Home Robertson, Helen Eadie, Jackie Baillie, Susan Deacon, Kate Maclean, Janis Hughes, Dennis Canavan, Pauline McNeill, Elaine Thomson, Elaine Smith, Angus MacKay, Karen Gillon, Des McNulty, Karen Whitefield, Cathy Peattie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*
S1M-3075 Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn (lodged on 7 May 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3075 Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn (lodged on 7 May 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-3075 Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn (lodged on 7 May 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3075 Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn (lodged on 7 May 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3075 Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn (lodged on 7 May 2002) Irene Oldfather*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3075 Baroness Barbara Castle of Blackburn (lodged on 7 May 2002) Brian Adam*
